DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this study is to determine the maximum tolerated dose (MTD), dose limiting toxicity (DLT), and safety profile of CHIR-258 when administered to subjects with refractory or relapsed multiple myeloma (MM).
DOC.brief_title: TKI258 in Subjects With Refractory or Relapsed Multiple Myeloma
DOC.criteria: Confirmed diagnosis of multiple myeloma Evidence of relapsed or refractory disease Intracranial disease or epidural disease Clinically significant cardiac disease Diabetes mellitus
